alert.note: Alert for Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:17PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SEWARD...WESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN HASKELL COUNTIES... At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Kismet, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Liberal, Kismet, Hayne and Plains. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
